sections.TOP:
Lord of Riverrun05283bb3g177i24jeitbdt67u8rt19phvzxc1577862014-08-27T15:55:36ZDaemon Targaryen24097499[[File:Riverrun.png|thumb|right|300px|[[Riverrun]], the seat of the Lord of Riverrun.]]
The '''Lord of Riverrun''' is the ruler of the stronghold of [[Riverrun]], the capital of the [[Riverlands]]. The holder is the ruler of the entire region of [[the Riverlands]].

Before the [[House Targaryen|Targaryen]] conquest, the Riverlands were ruled by the [[ironborn]]. [[Aegon the Conqueror]]'s assault was assisted by an uprising held by [[House Tully]]. Therefore, House Tully have ruled as the Lords of Riverrun ever since the conquest.
sections.Lords of Riverrun:
*Lord {[[Hoster Tully]]}, died of natural causes.
*Lord [[Edmure Tully]], stripped of lands and titles for rebellion against the [[Iron Throne]]. [[Hostage|Imprisoned]] at [[the Twins]].
*Lord [[Walder Frey]], Lord of the Crossing, awarded with Riverrun (de jure)
*Ser [[Brynden Tully]], holding Riverrun in Edmure's name.

===Historical Lords of Riverrun===
* [[Edmyn Tully]]
